speaker: Presented by F. Michael Watson
title: Statistical Report 1987
description: For the information of the members of the Church, the First Presidency has issued the following statistical report concerning the growth and status of the Church as of December 31, 1987. (Membership figures include estimates based on 1987 reports available prior to conference.)
body: For the information of the members of the Church, the First Presidency has issued the following statistical report concerning the growth and status of the Church as of December 31, 1987. (Membership figures include estimates based on 1987 reports available prior to conference.)
Number of sovereign countries with organized wards or branches
Number of territories, colonies, and possessions with organized wards or branches
(These statistics reflect an increase of 44 stakes and 617 wards and branches during 1987.)
Total membership at the close of 1987

Kimball; Elva Taylor Cowley, widow of Matthew Cowley, former member of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles; Alexander Schreiner, Tabernacle organist for fifty-three years; Louise W.
